Magic Missile Information

Description: Shoot 3 magical darts, each dealing 2-5 Force damage. They always hit their target. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Magic Missile

Magic Missile can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight Magic Missile can be cast by using the following I
